Default.edit_text:
gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0

Point Cloud.edit_text:
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling * 0 - slider.scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity * 0 + 10
self.bg_color[:] = 0

Only SH.edit_text:
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc * slider.dc_scale
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest * slider.sh_scale

Filter Opacity.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gaussian._opacity, dim=-1) < slider.opacity

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz[mask]
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation[mask]
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling[mask]
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity[mask]
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc[mask]
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest[mask]
self.bg_color[:] = 0

Highlight Large Gaussians.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gaussian._scaling, dim=-1) < slider.scaling

color = [slider.r, slider.g ,slider.b]
gaussian._features_dc[mask] = gaussian._features_dc[mask] * 0 + torch.tensor(color, device="cuda")
self.bg_color[:] = 1

Random Colors.edit_text:
torch.manual_seed(0)
gaussian._features_dc = torch.rand_like(gaussian._features_dc) * slider.intensity - slider.intensity / 2
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest * 0

Recoloring.edit_text:
selected_color = torch.tensor([slider.r, slider.g, slider.b], device="cuda")

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc + selected_color
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0

Filter Small Gaussians.edit_text:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gaussian._scaling, dim=-1) < slider.scaling

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz[mask]
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation[mask]
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling[mask]
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity[mask]
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc[mask]
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest[mask]

Translate.edit_text:
gaussian._xyz[:,0] = gaussian._xyz[:,0] + slider.x * 0.1
gaussian._xyz[:,1] = gaussian._xyz[:,1] + slider.y * 0.1
gaussian._xyz[:,2] = gaussian._xyz[:,2] + slider.z * 0.1

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz*slider.scale
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0

Translate v1.edit_text:
gaussian._xyz[:,0] = gaussian._xyz[:,0] + slider.x * 0.1
gaussian._xyz[:,1] = gaussian._xyz[:,1] + slider.y * 0.1
gaussian._xyz[:,2] = gaussian._xyz[:,2] + slider.z * 0.1

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz*slider.scale
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling+1
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc[..., 0] = gaussian._features_dc[..., 0] + 10
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0
